chunks.title: Roar_in_voice._LOW
chunks.text: I remember in one of his speeches he said that he sends one rupee from Delhi, but where he sends the rupee, he ends up with 19 paise.

chunks.title: Roar_in_voice._LOW
chunks.text: I asked him, how does this miracle happen?

chunks.title: Roar_in_voice._LOW
chunks.text: Bhaskar said, when the rupee moves, it slips.

chunks.title: Roar_in_voice._LOW
chunks.text: The situation of the country's coins is not good.

chunks.title: Roar_in_voice._LOW
chunks.text: Corruption has become a national disease.
